CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to output the selected record.

CustomProperties.Name: Search
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to enable the search functionality.

CustomProperties.Name: Default
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to set the default selected item.

CustomProperties.Name: PrimaryOrange
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to toggle the primary color

CustomProperties.Name: Required
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to toggle if the form is required.

CustomProperties.Name: DisplayMode
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to set the display mode.

CustomProperties.Name: HeightWhenExpanded
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to customize the height of the component when expanded.

Rules.InvariantScript:
//Use the RenameColumns function to substitute the sample columns names with your own.
Table({dropdownText: "New", dropdownValue: ""},{dropdownText: "Closed", dropdownValue: ""},{dropdownText: "Inactive", dropdownValue: ""},{dropdownText: "Pending", dropdownValue: ""},{dropdownText: "In progress", dropdownValue: ""})

If('Single Selection Drop Down'.Search = true, "
" , "
")
If('Single Selection Drop Down'.Search = true, TextInput1_1.Height + Gallery1_2.Height + 45, Gallery1_2.Height+45)
If('Single Selection Drop Down'.Search = true, TextInput1_1.Height + Gallery1_2.Height + 10, Gallery1_2.Height)
If('Single Selection Drop Down'.Search = true, TextInput1_1.Y-5, Gallery1_2.Y)
If('Single Selection Drop Down'.Search = true, showDropDown = true, false)
If('Single Selection Drop Down'.Search = true, showDropDown = true, false)
If(IsBlank('Single Selection Drop Down'.Default), {}, LookUp('Single Selection Drop Down'.DropDownItems, dropdownText = 'Single Selection Drop Down'.Default))
Filter('Single Selection Drop Down'.DropDownItems, TextInput1_1.Text in dropdownText)
If('Single Selection Drop Down'.Search = true, TextInput1_1.Y + TextInput1_1.Height + 5, Button1_30.X + Button1_30.Height + 10)
